article:
'COM Express', a computer-on-module (COM) form factor, is a highly integrated
and compact PC that can be used in a design application much like an integrated
circuit component. Each COM Express Module COM integrates core CPU and memory
functionality, the common I/O of a PC/AT, USB, audio, graphics (PEG), and
Ethernet. All I/O signals are mapped to two high density, low profile connectors
on the bottom side of the module.
